description: Creates a long-lived token. A refresh token is a JWT token used to get an access token. With an access token, you can call AssumeRoleWithWebIdentity to get role credentials that you can use to call License Manager to manage the specified license.

parameters.name: LicenseArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the license. The ARN is mapped to the aud claim of the JWT token.

parameters.name: RoleArns
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM roles to embed in the token. License Manager does not check whether the roles are in use. (string) ---

parameters.name: TokenProperties
parameters.description: Data specified by the caller to be included in the JWT token. The data is mapped to the amr claim of the JWT token. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Token
nested_items.description: Refresh token, encoded as a JWT token.
